snippet: Mr. McElroy photographed young artists as they used painting, sculpture, music, dance, acting, poetry, light, sound, scents and even trash to influence modern art.
abstract: Robert R McElroy, photographer who documented the Happenings art movement, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Mr. McElroy photographed young artists as they used painting, sculpture, music, dance, acting, poetry, light, sound, scents and even trash to influence modern art.

headline.seo: Robert R. McElroy Dies at 84; Documented Happenings Movement
headline.main: Robert R. McElroy Dies at 84; Documented Art ‘Happenings’
headline.print_headline: Robert R. McElroy, 84; Captured the Fleeting Art ‘Happenings’
